title: Wedding Photography
description: Nirob Hasan could be the best option for your big day. He has been successfully covering wedding events as well with his photography creativity to make the day special for couples. If I ask a couple to make a list of wedding photography expectations? Then the list will be too long. And meeting these long expectations is not easy. To fulfill this expectation he has given the idea of wedding photography a new dimension. You cannot ignore the apparent creativity of Nirob Hasan’s photography. His clicks will grab anyone’s attention at first glance.

title: Fashion Photography
description: As fashion is totally an abstract thing so, his different way of capturing has led him to work with numerous Bangladeshi models. In most cases, fashion photography applies the same type of photographic style. But when fashion is emphasized in Hasib's view then it looks a little bit different. Hasib thinks that – it’s important to reflect the glamour in fashion photography so the charm can attract a viewer’s fascination. That’s the reason, you will choose Hasib's Photography as your fashion photographic partner. Newspapers and magazines have proudly published many of his works. Nirob Hasan is moving faster than other contemporary photographers in Bangladesh.

title: New Born Photography
description: Newborn Photography captures the jubilation of parenthood. As babies grow very fast, these moments will pass in a blink of an eye: you’ll never see your little one being so small again! These will be the moments, not only you, but your new baby too will keep coming back to in the coming years. Preserve these moments and cherish them forever. Finding the best newborn baby photographer isn’t an easy task — even for smart Bangladeshis. With rich 7 years of experience in photoshoots for babies, I do newborn photo shoot, newborn baby photoshoots with parents, and birth photography preserving pregnancy delivery photos. I'm also into baby delivery photos in advertising or for editorial publication.

title: Product Photography
description: Though product photography sounds all simple but it’s tricky and challenging. There is a difference between capturing a photo of human beings and products. Unless you capture it with a perfect frame then you can’t show the beauty of product photography in a picture. There is a saying that the first impression is the last impression. A photographer has to use certain techniques so that it can grab the attention of the consumer at first glance. No one can beat Nirob Hasan to create the first impression that lasts forever. He does all kinds of product photography including e-commerce photography, advertising photography, food photography and many more.
